revised_title: A Case Study of Chronic Constipation and its Effects on the Human Body
tldr: This article presents a case study of a person who suffered from chronic constipation throughout their life. Despite having a good appetite and being able to perform physical labor, the individual experienced severe intestinal obstruction, with the longest interval between bowel movements reaching 23 weeks. The case highlights the importance of understanding the causes and effects of constipation on the human body and the need for further research on this condition.
